fullStack_javaScript_developer: Hey! I’m Ilia, FullStack JavaScript Developer
open_for_work:
Liked my code? I’m currently open for work as
FullStack JavaScript Developer.
amdocs_description: You know the IKEA catalog, right? It's a comprehensive book that showcases everything they sell in one place. Similarly, operators like Golan, HOT, T-Mobile, Vodafone also need a catalog to define and showcase everything they offer to their customers. Catalog One is a cloud-native solution built using microservices technology. It enables operators to streamline their processes and significantly reduce time to market for their products and services.
microsoft_description: Microsoft 365 Defender is a unified pre- and post-breach enterprise defense suite that natively coordinates detection, prevention, investigation, and response across endpoints, identities, email, and applications to provide integrated protection against sophisticated attacks. Made with React, Typescript, and modern FrontEnd technologies.
personal_project_description: React based website made with Webpack build tool. Includes Lazy loading, light/dark theme switcher, internationalization, and additional dependencies such as react-scroll, react-icons, and integration with EmailJs. App architecture is based on Feature-Sliced Design.
